meanings.definition: A synthetic hormone with progestational effects.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed progestogen to regulate my menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent2: Progestogen is commonly used in birth control pills.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled progestogen on my shirt, and now it smells like medicine.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a dose of progestogen in the chaotic office.
meanings.sent5: The progestogen injection slowly released its effects over time.

meanings.definition: Any substance that has the effects of progesterone.
meanings.sent1: The herbal supplement claimed to contain natural progestogen for hormonal balance.
meanings.sent2: Some foods naturally contain progestogen-like properties.
meanings.sent3: The progestogen in the lotion made my skin feel smoother instantly.
meanings.sent4: His words had a comforting progestogen-like effect on her anxiety.
meanings.sent5: The progestogen supplement helped alleviate her PMS symptoms.
